3.1M7
1. download fastutils source from here
http://fastutil.dsi.unimi.it/fastutil-4.4.1-src.tar.gz
2. create a java project with a source folder src
3. import the source into the src folder
4. note that packages are bogus
5. select the src folder and 'remove from build path"
6. select the src/fastutil-4.4.1/java folder and "set as source folder"
7. error dialog!

(as far as I can tell nothing bad actually happens but the message is wrong and
it should not appear. the log entry is bogus too)

org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException: Cannot nest

nesting exclude 'fastutil-4.4.1/' from 'xxx_fastutil/src'
